content: **christmas decoration with little flower top in cotton viscose and glitter ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** approx 4 5-5 cm 1 ¾ -2 high **materials** drops cotton viscose from garnstudio 50 g color no 07 red + 50 g color no 04 yellow drops glitter from garnstudio 1 spool color no 08 red + 1 spool color no 03 copper accessory cotton wool to fill ball drops crochet hook size 2 5 mm us c/2
